name: Super MusicBox
description:
This is a little rhythm game made for LD50 - Delay the inevitable.

Just pick a song and try to hit all the notes to keep dancing!

Unfortunately some features didn't make it into the game:

- Volume settings
- Score system
- WebBuild (Unity WebBuilder does not support analyzed music)

________________________________________________________________

Tools: Unity 2020.3 / Kryta / beepbox.co

Big thanks to El-Zach, who wrote the code for this game! <3
